name: Dice Hard
description:
Join the battlefield like a true Dice Master!

Hire your party and join a fearsome battle to the last dice!

You are a Dice Master. You use your dice to fight other dic-enemies.

When you start a battle, you throw all your dice. Every face has a different character class, with specific stats and skills.

Defeat the mobs and collect money to purchase stronger dice and defeat the final boss!

Fight all the enemies to reach the dragon and save the kingdom.
